description: Their Men's Intraknit™ Merino Tech Full Zip is the ultimate balance of protection and performance. Knit-in wind protection, abrasion protection on the sleeves, and a DWR finish all work together to help you brave the elements — comfortably and confidently. And our Intrknit technology allowed us to still prioritize warmth, breathability, and ease of movement without sacrificing that durability and protection. Weather any weather in our most technical men's wool jacket to date.
name: Smartwool Intraknit Merino Tech Full Zip - Mens
